featured.text: We supply everything, 18 waist-high tubs, shampoo, and towels.

definition.zh_def: 洗髮水，一種用於清潔頭髮的液體或膏狀產品。
definition.en_def: A liquid or cream used for washing hair.
definition.example: I need to buy some shampoo for my dry hair.
